meanings.sent1: The doited man struggled to understand simple instructions.
meanings.sent2: She made a doited decision by trusting a stranger with her money.
meanings.sent3: The doited puppy kept chasing its own tail in circles.
meanings.sent4: Her doited behavior at the party raised a few eyebrows.
meanings.sent5: The doited squirrel forgot where it buried its nuts.

meanings.definition: To act in a confused or senile manner
meanings.sent1: Grandpa doited around the house, forgetting where he put his glasses.
meanings.sent2: The tired hiker doited along the trail, unsure of the path ahead.
meanings.sent3: The robot doited after its circuits got mixed up.
meanings.sent4: The students doited through the exam, struggling to remember the answers.
meanings.sent5: The actor doited on stage, unable to remember his lines.
